dcterms:creator: D. A. Henze
Z. Borhegyi
J. Csicsvari
A. Mamiya
K. D. Harris
G. Buzsáki
dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of neural recordings from the hippocampus of anesthetized rats, including extracellular and intracellular spike waveforms. The data was used to evaluate spike sorting algorithms by comparing extracellular recordings with ground truth intracellular recordings.
dcterms:title: Hippocampus Neural Dataset

dcterms:creator: K. D. Harris
D. A. Henze
J. Csicsvari
H. Hirase
G. Buzsáki
dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of neural recordings from the hippocampus of anesthetized rats, focusing on the accuracy of spike separation using tetrode recordings. The data includes both extracellular and intracellular spike waveforms for validation.
dcterms:title: Hippocampus Spike Separation Dataset
